channel.title: Birk Skyum on MapLibre
channel.description: Recent content in Birk Skyum on MapLibre

item.title: New People Joining the Maplibre Team
item.description: Three new people have joined the MapLibre Team. Please give them a warm welcome! Isaac Besora has joined MapLibre as Graphics Engineer. His initial focus will be improvements in MapLibre GL JS in particular in the areas of Terrain 3D and the new Globe feature.

item.title: Mappedin joins the MapLibre Sponsorship Program
item.description: Mappedin joins the MapLibre Sponsorship Program at the Silver tier. With a yearly donation of USD $10,000, Mappedin supports the maintenance of MapLibreâ€™s codebases and ensures a stable future for the project.

item.title: MapLibre GL JS v3
item.description: This release is a big step for MapLibre GL JS! With more than 500 commits, and almost a year in the making, version 3.0.0 is surely our best release yet.
